references: Related: CF 75608, CF 76036, CF 76055, CF 76533, CF 76767. Repealing: Ord 77664
summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal lighting and power system; providing for payment for work on certain projects heretofore authorized by Ordinances Nos. 75608, 76036, 76055, 76533 and 76767, and for repayment to the Light Fund of moneys heretofore advanced; making an appropriation from the Light Department Construction Fund therefor; and repealing Ordinance No. 77664.
